function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High death rates in specific cities and regions","Impact":"High loss of life, overwhelmed healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Improved healthcare infrastructure, public health awareness campaigns","Technologies":"Healthcare technology, data analysis tools","People":"Residents of cities with high death rates","Owner":"Healthcare authorities, government agencies"},{"Description":"Exponential growth of cases in multiple countries","Impact":"Potential for tens of thousands of cases in multiple countries","Mitigation":"Effective management and control measures, public health interventions","Technologies":"Data analytics, public health surveillance systems","People":"Residents of countries experiencing rapid case growth","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies"},{"Description":"Changes in data formats and potential API failure","Impact":"Disruption to real-time data updates, reliance on historical data","Mitigation":"Regular monitoring of data sources, development of alternative data access methods","Technologies":"Data monitoring tools, backup data storage systems","People":"Researchers, public health authorities","Owner":"Data management teams"}]}
